newsitems.title: Particle Mayhem Winners
newsitems.contents: After a one hundred day event, 142 submissions, and a judging process that took the help of other scientists to keep the particles at bay, the Particle Mayhem group is ready to announce their winners! The organizers want to thank everyone who created particles and contributed to the event! The eve...

newsitems.title: The Highlander Open #3
newsitems.contents: If you're looking to get into league-style competitive Team Fortress, sign up for The Highlander Open #3, an initiative to introduce non-competitive players into the competitive scene. And what exactly is this, we hear you ask? Well check out their fantastic and visually pleasing Highlander Open W...

newsitems.title: ETF2L Highlander Season 20 Grand Final
newsitems.contents: (Image credit - Mr. Anchois) What better way to start off the year 2020 with the ETF2L Highlander Season 20 Grand Final? We'll find out together if Super Dickmann's KANNONEN! are able to defend their title against Feila eSports in a best of three map battle. Join the action live on KritzKast s Twi...
